overview: Mr. Grove oversees all aspects of IT strategy and delivery. Prior to joining the company, Mr. Grove was the senior vice president of engineering at GetWellNetwork, a leading provider of interactive patient care solutions. He has also served as the vice president of the IT eCommerce division of InPhonic Inc., and held various management roles in the technology divisions of CrossTier.com Inc. and Varsity Group Inc. (formerly known as VarsityBooks.com, LLC). He started his career in technology at Sallie Mae, holding several different positions within the IT organization. Mr. Grove holds a B.S. from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill.
